'''''SEVEN 17''''' is the seventeenth volume of the [[Marion E. Wade Center]]'s annual journal ''[[SEVEN]]'', published in [[2000]].<ref name="jstor" />

The article "Tolkien and Esperanto" reprints [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s letter "[[A Philologist on Esperanto]]", and also includes quotes from the [[Book of the Foxrook]].<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=https://www.jstor.org/stable/45296768|articlename=Tolkien and Esperanto|website=[https://jstor.org JSTOR]|accessed=13 August 2025}}</ref>
==Contents==

*"The Lion at 50"
**By: Colin Manlove
*"Tolkien and Esperanto"
**By: [[Arden R. Smith]] and [[Patrick H. Wynne|Patrick Wynne]]
*"'Dear Jim...': The Reconstruction of a Friendship"
**By: Barbara Reynolds

**By: K. James Gilchrist
